import React from 'react' import { Tabs, TabList, TabPanels, Tab, TabPanel } from "@chakra-ui/react" import { Image } from "@chakra-ui/image"; import { Stack, Circle, Flex, Box, Text, Heading} from "@chakra-ui/layout"; import { useMediaQuery } from "@chakra-ui/media-query"; import { useColorMode, useColorModeValue} from "@chakra-ui/color-mode"; import pr1 from "../images/projects/pr1.png" import pr2 from "../images/projects/pr2.png" const ProjectTab = () => { const { colorMode } = useColorMode(); const isDark = colorMode === "dark"; const [isNotSmallerScreen] = useMediaQuery("(min-width:600px)"); const colors = useColorModeValue( ["red.50", "teal.50", "blue.50"], ["red.900", "teal.900", "blue.900"], ) const [tabIndex, setTabIndex] = React.useState(0) const bg = colors[tabIndex] return ( setTabIndex(index)} bg={bg} variant="soft-rounded" colorScheme="blue"> Our Projects Commercial projects Residential projects LVYUE hotel LVYUE hotel management (India) Pvt Ltd A Hotel Project on Golf Course extension road Gurugram :-2.5CR (approx)

two!

three!

 ) } export default ProjectTab
